definition: The term "flexibl" refers to the quality of being adaptable or adjustable in various situations or circumstances. It commonly describes something that can easily change or be modified to suit different needs or requirements. This word is often used to describe objects, systems, or individuals that can easily bend, change shape, or be altered to accommodate different conditions or purposes.

examples.german: Ich bin flexibel und kann mich schnell an neue Situationen anpassen.
examples.english: I am flexible and can adapt quickly to new situations.

examples.german: Unser Unternehmen bietet flexible Arbeitszeiten an.
examples.english: Our company offers flexible working hours.

examples.german: Die Yogaübungen helfen dabei, den Körper flexibler zu machen.
examples.english: The yoga exercises help to make the body more flexible.

examples.german: Der Vertrag enthält flexible Klauseln, die bei Bedarf angepasst werden können.
examples.english: The contract contains flexible clauses that can be adjusted if necessary.

examples.german: Die flexiblen Gummibänder können für verschiedene Zwecke verwendet werden.
examples.english: The flexible rubber bands can be used for various purposes.
